top.title: US Senate passes deal aimed at ending government shutdown

top.title: Philippines hit by 'intense' typhoon as nearly a million evacuate
top.summary: Typhoon Fung-wong, with sustained winds of 185 km/h (115mph), hit the Philippines as a super typhoon and later weakened.

top.title: China exempts chips used by carmakers from export curbs
top.summary: The block on exports of the company's chips had raised fears that European car production would be hit.
